pullRequest.title: feat(REST): Added new allDetails Parameter to List Projects and List Releases API to fetch records with all details.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added new allDetails Parameter to List Projects and List Releases API to fetch records with all details.

Which issue is this pull request belonging to and how is it solving it? (#873)
Did you add or update any new dependencies that are required for your change?


How To Test?

Invoke List Projects and List Releases with allDetails parameter
/resource/api/projects?allDetails=true
/resource/api/releases?allDetails=true
Need to be tested in test instance with large dataset to validate any timeout issue.

Checklist
Must:

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit jaideep.palit@siemens.com

nodes.bodyText: There is already a method getAllReleases(). May be same can be used in thrift layer.
May be this can be final boolean isSearchByName = name != null && !name.isEmpty() and can be used in if clause and subsequently can be passed to the method.
